definitionContent: Web Service is an application exposed over the Internet using well-documented APIs which allow users and client applications to perform some defined set of functionality.
citationURLTitle: Glossary of Terms - GeoPlatform Concepts - GeoPlatform.gov

definitionContent: Web Feature Service is a standard protocol published by the Open Geospatial Consortium for serving feature data, often geospatially rich, over the Internet.
citationURLTitle: Glossary of Terms - Miscellaneous Terms - GeoPlatform.gov

definitionContent: WGS84 is a standard coordinate system for use in cartography, geodesy, and navigation including by GPS.
citationURLTitle: Glossary of Terms - Miscellaneous Terms - GeoPlatform.gov

definitionContent: Web Map Service is a standard protocol published by the Open Geospatial Consortium for serving georeferenced map images over the Internet that are generated by a map server using data from a GIS database.
citationURLTitle: Glossary of Terms - Miscellaneous Terms - GeoPlatform.gov
